title: Runes Where?
body: I would like to know what happened with the pages of runes that I bought earlier

replies.body:
You can still use all of the extra rune pages you bought in the past (which is the main reason they weren't fully refunded, you can still use them all).

You can find your rune pages in Collection -> Runes. To create a new page, you need to click Create New in the top right.
